job.title: Engineer III, Software Engineer
job.description: In partnership with Product Management and Quality Assurance, your team shares a common mission to create products that satisfy our users. Your team will enable product engineering teams, promises engineering excellence and deliver high-quality end product. This product line includes a large portfolio of analytical tools and models that enable a global team of Ratings Analysts to analyze, gain insight, score and contribute critical insights to our core Ratings process. With these products you will help our global team of Ratings Analysts, Methodology and Criteria specialists create world class ratings & research across more than 90 global economies enabling them to create and test hypothetical ‘what if’ credit-risk scenarios and perform a host of other critical analytical tasks. S&P Global states that the anticipated base salary range for this position is $55,900 - $155,900. Base salary ranges may vary by geographic location.  In addition to base compensation, this role is eligible for an annual incentive bonus.  This role is eligible to receive additional S&P Global benefits. For more information on the benefits we provide to our employees, visit  https://www.spgbenefitessentials.com/newhires To all recruitment agencies: S&P Global does not accept unsolicited agency resumes.
